text: This is one of the best preschools in Singapore. The teachers are so compassionate, caring and skilled. Rest assured your kids are in best trained hands. Miss Sakinah , Miss Aishah and the entire CT team are amazing. We will be forever indebted to the them .
Street view of the school. Nice place, located about 10 minutes walk from beauty world mrt station

My partner and I have been so impressed with Ms Sakinah, Ms Aisha and their team at Creative Thinkers. Not only is my (R) child well cared for, R is also educated and has better manners from attending. R looks forward to going to daycare there and is always left in high spirits. R's clothes used to always come back stained at the daycare we attended overseas but at Creative Thinkers R is always kept clean. We love the CTP family!
